B

BACK - view.Icon
The character used for the back button
backButton - Variable in class view.BottomPanel
Button to go to the previous song
backButton - Variable in class view.LogIn
Button to go back from register to log in
BACKGROUND - view.ColorConstants
Color used for the background of the app
backToSongsButton - Variable in class view.Songs
Button used to return to the main songs view when adding to a playlist
BottomPanel - Class in view
Class with the bottom panel functionalities for song playing
BottomPanel(PlaylistBarEvent) - Constructor for class view.BottomPanel
Initiates variables and configures the bottom bar
buildLogin() - Method in class view.LogIn
Builds everything in the log in screen
buildRegister() - Method in class view.LogIn
Builds everything in the register screen
BusinessFacade - Class in model
Class tasked with managing the access to the business logic, also manages DAO access
BusinessFacade(SongDAO, UserDAO, PlaylistDAO, ConfigDAO, StatisticsDAO) - Constructor for class model.BusinessFacade
Initiates the class and the DAOs
BUTTON - view.ColorConstants
Color used for some buttons
